name: fifaworldcupfever
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
fifa world cup fever skill will give users news and information of world cup matches on daily basis.
it will tell few significant moments and highlighting talks happened in the day regarding the world cup matches palyed on that day. it will also tell the final score and stats of the matches played.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
